page.title: 13Recreation
page.content: TABLE TENNIS CLUB Every Wednesday in the winter Mrs Dale runs a table tennis club. They have two table tennis tables and one snooker table. It costs 20p to go each time and the junior session lasts from 6.00-7.00.The session for older children lasts from 7.00-9.00. Sometimes in the winter Mrs.Dale runs discos in the village hall. Many local people spend their evenings in one of the three local pubs.The Waterloo is a bar rather than a pub and is run by Mr Lee the shopkeeper.It is very small indeed.The pubs are called The White Horse and The Wheatsheaf. At Alton Water Reservoir you can go fishing for pike, roach, eels ,perch and other freshwater fish.You can also go windsurfing and sailing.
